title: The All-American (CRS151)
description:
A Classic RISK! Singles episode! A story that Ernest Anfin first shared on the podcast in February of 2021 about what a childhood on a farm taught him about compassion.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Ernest Anfin, Taj Easton, Kevin Allison, Zerman Zane)
